text: the last push for pro-government forces
they know the goal is within sight
the rebels struggling to hold on to the
few districts that remain under their
control
as the president's forces and allies
sweep through retaking East Aleppo
thousands have been fleeing Russia
claiming they've aided a hundred

today
fresh allegations of war crimes against
the regime 82 civilians killed women and
children among them in their home
according to the UN civilians have paid
a brutal price during his conflict and
we're filled with the deepest foreboding
for those who remain in this last
hellish corner of opposition-held
eastern Aleppo
while some reportedly managed to flee
yesterday some were reportedly caught
and killed on the spot and others were
arrested with a fighting going on around
them those still trapped sending what
they say are their final messages a plea
for an end to their nightmare don't
believe anymore in United Nation don't

community
don't think that they are not satisfied

um that you are being killed social

posted my dad is injured now I am crying
her father's texts the BBC guess it's
goodbye thanks all who stand for us and

their suffering goes on almost montgome
